explains: adv. 无情地；残忍地；冷酷地

sentences.en: Gloria showed signs of turning into the ruthlessly efficient woman her father wanted her to be.
sentences.cn: 格洛丽亚有迹象变成为她父亲所期望的那种坚决无情、办事利落的女人。

sentences.en: The party has ruthlessly crushed any sign of organized opposition.
sentences.cn: 该党残酷地将任何有组织反抗都消灭在了萌芽状态。

sentences.en: The animals were ruthlessly hunted to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 这些动物由于遭到无情的捕猎而濒于灭绝。
